UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory activities of three chensinin-1 peptides containing mutation of glycine and histidine residues.
Literature.Author: Dong W, Mao X, Guan Y, Kang Y, Shang D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli AS1.349(MIC=3.13µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.860(MIC=1.56µM),Staphylococcus aureus AS1.72(MIC=3.13µM),Bacillus cereus AS1.126(MIC=3.13µM),Lactococcus lactis AS1.1690(MIC=6.25µM),Enterococcus faecalis CGMCC 1.595(MIC=1.56µM),Enterococcus faecium CGMCC 1.2334(MIC=1.56µM)
